Detailed Description

Generic convergence test with advection, diffusion and source terms.

Subroutine that tests convergence for advection, diffusion and source terms A fine grid initial condition and solution at time total_time must be provided.

Parameters:
[in]hydroHydrodynamics
[in]bc_advective_fluxAdvection BC
[in]bc_diffusive_fluxDiffusion BC
[in]bc_diffusive_matrixDiffusion BC
[in]source_termSource term
[in]labelUnique label for test
[in]verboseWhether to output convergence results
[in]nconcNumber of constituents
[in]nstep_baseNumber of steps at finest resolution
[in]nx_baseNumber of cells at finest resolution
[in]fine_initial_concInitial condition at finest resolution
[in]fine_solutionReference solution at finest resolution
[in]total_timeTotal time of simulation
[in]start_timeStart time of simulation
[in]domain_lengthLength of domain
[in]detail_printoutWhether to produce detailed printouts
